SELECT r.rent_code , r.member_id , b.book_name , b.book_library_code , w.writer_name , c.category_name , p.publisher_name , b.book_situation , r.rent_date FROM tb_rent AS r INNER JOIN tb_book AS b INNER JOIN tb_writer AS w INNER JOIN tb_category AS c INNER JOIN tb_publisher AS p ON r.book_code = b.book_code AND b.writer_code = w.writer_code AND b.category_code = c.category_code AND b.publisher_code = p.publisher_code AND b.book_situation = '대여 중'
WHERE ${sk} like CONCAT ('%',#{sv},'%')
ORDER BY r.rent_date
SELECT rent_code FROM tb_rent WHERE rent_code = #{rentCode}

SELECT r.rent_code , r.member_id , b.book_name , b.book_library_code , w.writer_name , c.category_name , p.publisher_name , b.book_situation , r.rent_date FROM tb_rent AS r INNER JOIN tb_book AS b INNER JOIN tb_writer AS w INNER JOIN tb_category AS c INNER JOIN tb_publisher AS p ON r.book_code = b.book_code AND b.writer_code = w.writer_code AND b.category_code = c.category_code AND b.publisher_code = p.publisher_code AND b.book_situation = '대여 중' ORDER BY r.rent_date

SELECT r.rent_code , l.library_name , b.book_name , r.rent_date , r.rent_return_date FROM tb_rent AS r INNER JOIN tb_book AS b INNER JOIN tb_library AS l ON r.book_code = b.book_code AND b.library_code = l.library_code AND member_id = #{SID}
WHERE ${sk} like CONCAT ('%',#{sv},'%')
